name: BasketWars: World at War for iOS
blurb: BasketWars is an insane, challenging basketball game set in WWII coming first to iOS in March 2014.

rewards.reward:
PRIVATE:
Get updates from the project, a set of BasketWars digital wallpapers, and of course, our eternal gratitude.

[Cumulative Reward: Project Updates + Digital Wallpapers]

PRIVATE FIRST CLASS:
Congratulations on ranking up soldier! Now you’re officially on the BasketWars Honor Roll, which means your name will now be in the credits of the game! Also, to get you in the mood, listen to the patriotic sound scape our good friend Erik Desiderio composed for the game!

[Cumulative Reward: Project Updates + Digital Wallpapers + Name in Credits + Digital Soundtrack]

SERGEANT:\r\nIdentical to the CORPORAL tier, but with a PDF version of the Mini Artbook.\r\n[Cumulative Reward: Project Updates + Digital Wallpapers + Name in Credits + Digital Soundtrack + PDF Mini Artbook + Sticker Pack + $4.99 Coin Pack]

CORPORAL:\r\nAs a dedicated soldier, we salute you with a look into the development of BasketWars with a limited edition physical Mini Artbook of character and environment art from the game, as well as a pack of our ball character stickers. On top of that, enjoy a pack of in-game coins worth $4.99.\r\n[Cumulative Reward: Project Updates + Digital Wallpapers + Name in Credits + Digital Soundtrack + PHYSICAL Mini Artbook + Sticker Pack + $4.99 Coin Pack + BasketWars iOS App Store Game Code]

STAFF SERGEANT:\r\nShow your pride with a BasketWars T-Shirt! Emblazoned on your chest will be your pick of one of our 4 characters. A loyal supporter, you deserve to be upgraded to a coin pack worth $9.99!\r\n[Cumulative Reward: Project Updates + Digital Wallpapers + Name in Credits + Soundtrack + PDF Mini Artbook + Sticker Pack + $9.99 Coin Pack + T-Shirt]

SERGEANT FIRST CLASS:\r\nWant more protection from enemy forces than a T-Shirt? You\u2019ll need the official BasketWars hoodie with your favorite character to have your back! As extra protection, we\u2019ll upgrade your coin pack to a whopping $19.99 bundle!\r\n[Cumulative Reward: Project Updates + Digital Wallpapers + Name in Credits + Soundtrack + PDF Mini Artbook + Sticker Pack + $19.99 Coin Pack + Hoodie]

MASTER SERGEANT:\r\nIf you admire the art of BasketWars, you\u2019ll appreciate this 11\u201d x 17\u201d landscape Limited Edition print of one of Bodie\u2019s beautiful environments. Bodie and the rest of the BasketWars team will sign your print to show our love and appreciation for your contribution.\r\n[Cumulative Reward: Project Updates + Digital Wallpapers + Name in Credits + Soundtrack + PDF Mini Artbook + Sticker Pack + $19.99 Coin Pack + T-Shirt -OR- Hoodie + Limited Edition Signed Print]

FIRST SERGEANT:\r\nSo you\u2019re the creative type! Put your imagination to the test with this custom illustration of anything from the BasketWars universe. What will you have Bodie paint for you?\r\n[Cumulative Reward: Project Updates + Digital Wallpapers + Name in Credits + Soundtrack + PDF Mini Artbook + Sticker Pack + $19.99 Coin Pack + T-Shirt -OR- Hoodie + Limited Edition Signed Print + Framed Custom Illustration]

SERGEANT MAJOR:\r\nWe\u2019ll create a custom ball character dedicated to you. Work with us to make something unique and we will integrate it into the game, backstory and all!\r\n[Cumulative Reward: Project Updates + Digital Wallpapers + Name in Credits + Soundtrack + PDF Mini Artbook + Sticker Pack + $19.99 Coin Pack + T-Shirt -OR- Hoodie + Limited Edition Signed Print + Custom Ball Character]

COMMAND SERGEANT MAJOR:\r\nCreate a custom ball character with us, as well as add an easter egg anywhere in the game! This could be a background animation, something on the map, you name it! To facilitate all this coordination, meet the game leads, Scott and Anthony, over Skype and discuss anything you like! Game design and development, future projects, anything that strikes your fancy!\r\n[Cumulative Reward: Project Updates + Digital Wallpapers + Name in Credits + Soundtrack + PDF Mini Artbook + Sticker Pack + $19.99 Coin Pack + T-Shirt -AND- Hoodie + Limited Edition Signed Print + Custom Ball Character + Easter Egg + JABB Skype Call]

SERGEANT MAJOR OF THE ARMY: 
Create not only a ball character under your direction, but also a soldier to match! We’ll also feature your company, game – anything reasonable – on our website AND in the game itself! And for the grand prize, come on over to JABB headquarters for a full day with the team. We’ll pamper you and name you Sergeant Major of the BasketWars Army! This brings with it special access to future updates to BasketWars and other JABB games and the team itself.
**Contact us if you're not near Los Angeles and we will work something out to help you get here**
[Cumulative Reward: Project Updates + Digital Wallpapers + Name in Credits + Soundtrack + PDF Mini Artbook + Sticker Pack + $19.99 Coin Pack + T-Shirt -AND- Hoodie + Limited Edition Signed Print + Custom Ball + Custom Soldier + Promo placement on site AND game + In-game Easter egg + Title of SMBWA + Hang out at JABB HQ]
